      • getSrcFileLink

        java.lang.StringBuffer getSrcFileLink(boolean toplevel,
                                      boolean withAnchor,
                                      ClassInfo classInfo)
        Get a link to a source file for a given class, e.g. "com/abc/A.java#A"
        Parameters:
        toplevel - whether we need a link to a file from a top level (will contain package path) or not (will have a link to file only)
        withAnchor - whether link should contain an anchor to the clas
        classInfo - class we want a link for
        Returns:
        StringBuffer
